org.apache.hadoop.fs.permission

Class UmaskParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.fs.permission.PermissionParser
      • org.apache.hadoop.fs.permission.UmaskParser

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
@InterfaceStability.Unstable
 class UmaskParser
extends PermissionParser
    Parse umask value provided as a string, either in octal or symbolic format and return it as a short value. Umask values are slightly different from standard modes as they cannot specify sticky bit or X.

    • Method Detail

      • getUMask

        public short getUMask()
        To be used for file/directory creation only. Symbolic umask is applied relative to file mode creation mask; the permission op characters '+' results in clearing the corresponding bit in the mask, '-' results in bits for indicated permission to be set in the mask. For octal umask, the specified bits are set in the file mode creation mask.
        Returns:
        umask
